module.name: product_identification
module.purpose: The Product identification application module supports the representation of products.

inscope.li: representation of the data that identify a product;

definition.def:
a collection of information models, specified in EXPRESS language, that can be reused to specify application specific information models within the domain of industrial data.
At the time of publication of the present document, common resources are specified in the following documents:
ISO 10303 Generic and Application Integrated Resources and Application Integrated Constructs,
ISO/TS 10303-1001 through 1009,
ISO 13584-20 - Logical resource: Logical model of expressions.

result of a change made on a product or on a characterization of a product, of an activity or of any concept related to a product or an activity. The first release of that object is The initial revision.

uof.name: Product_Identification
uof.description: The Product_Identification UoF specifies the data types needed to represent the data that identify a product.
